# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(str::String, text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(str)
    lines = String[]
    current_line = ""

    for word in words
        if length(current_line * " " * word) <= text_width
            current_line *= " " * word
        else
            push!(lines, current_line)
            current_line = word
        end
    end
    
    # Don't forget the last line
    if !isempty(current_line)
        push!(lines, current_line)
    end

    return join(lines, '\n')
end
```
Example:
```julia
str = "This is a test string for word wrapping in Julia programming language."
println(wrap_string(str))
```
